summary: Implements a mock backend for EC2 DHCP options sets, providing classes to represent a DHCP options collection and to manage its lifecycle—including creation, retrieval, deletion, filtering, and association with VPCs—while enforcing ID validation and dependency rules.
business_intent: Enable developers to simulate AWS EC2 DHCP options behavior in tests, allowing creation, description, modification, and cleanup of DHCP options sets without contacting real AWS services.
